00007 /**
00008  * http-request class that does GET and POST (and even SSL) and has no dependencies
00009  *
00010  * @author mnt@codeninja.de
00011  * @package kata_utility
00012  *
00013  * Kata - Lightweight MVC Framework <http://www.codeninja.de/>

00018  */
00019 class HttpUtility {
00020 
00021     /**
00022      * @var array will hold all returned webserver-headers
00023      */
00024     private $returnHeaders;
00025     /**
00026      * @var bool true to automatically follow redirects
00027      */
00028     private $followRedirects= true;
00029 /**
00030  * send cookies we got on the last request?
00031  */
00032     private $rememberCookies=false;
00033 /**
00034  * cookies from last request
00035  */
00036     private $lastCookies=array();
00037 
00038     const TYPE_GET= 1;
00039     const TYPE_POST= 2;
00040     const TYPE_HEAD= 3;
00041 
00042     /**
00043      * do a GET request to given url. you dont have to encode get-parameters, just give it as array
00044      *
00045      * @param string $url base-url to request to eg. http://example.com/foo/bar
00046      * @param array $getVars optional get-parameters to append to url
00047      * @param array $headers optional request-headers to add to request
00048      * @return mixed returns html or false if something went wrong (then ask lastError())
00049      */
00050     public function get($url, $getVars= false, $headers= false) {
00051         return $this->doRequest(self :: TYPE_GET, $url, $getVars, false, $headers);
00052     }
00053 
00054     /**
00055      * do a HEAD request to given url. you dont have to encode get-parameters, just give it as array
00056      *
00057      * @param string $url base-url to request to eg. http://example.com/foo/bar
00058      * @param array $getVars optional get-parameters to append to url
00059      * @param array $headers optional request-headers to add to request
00060      * @return mixed returns html or false if something went wrong (then ask lastError())
00061      */
00062     public function head($url, $getVars= false, $headers= false) {
00063         return $this->doRequest(self :: TYPE_HEAD, $url, $getVars, false, $headers);
00064     }
00065 
00066     /**
00067      * do a GET request to given url. you dont have to encode get-parameters, just give it as array
00068      *
00069      * @param string $url base-url to request to eg. http://example.com/foo/bar
00070      * @param array $getVars optional get-parameters to append to url
00071      * @param array $postVars optional post-parameters to add to request
00072      * @param array $headers optional request-headers to add to request
00073      * @return mixed returns html or false if something went wrong (then ask lastError())
00074      */
00075     public function post($url, $getVars= false, $postVars= false, $headers= false) {
00076         return $this->doRequest(self :: TYPE_POST, $url, $getVars, $postVars, $headers);
00077     }
00078 
00079     /**
00080      * @param bool whether or not to follow redirects like 301,303 etc.
00081      */
00082     public function setFollowRedirects($follow) {
00083         $this->followRedirects= $follow;
00084     }

00086     /**
00087      * @param bool whether or not to remember cookies
00088      */
00089     public function setRemembercookies($remember) {
00090         $this->rememberCookies= $remember;
00091     }
00092 
00093     /**
00094      * actual wrapper
00095      * @param int $type see TYPE_ consts. get/post/head
00096      * @param string $url
00097      * @param array $getVars
00098      * @param array $postVars
00099      * @param array $headers
00100      * @return string html
00101      */
00102     protected function doRequest($type, $url, $getVars, $postVars, $headers) {
00103         if (false === $headers) {
00104             $headers= array ();
00105         }
00106 
00107         $urlArr= parse_url($url);
00108         if (isset ($urlArr['user'], $urlArr['pass'])) {
00109             $url= str_replace($urlArr['user'].':'.$urlArr['pass'].'@', '', $url);
00110             $headers['Authorization']= 'Basic '.base64_encode($urlArr['user'].':'.$urlArr['pass']);
00111         }
00112 
00113         if ($type == self :: TYPE_GET) {
00114             $params= array (
00115                 'http' => array (
00116                     'method' => 'GET'
00117                 )
00118             );
00119         }
00120 
00121         if ($type == self :: TYPE_HEAD) {
00122             $params= array (
00123                 'http' => array (
00124                     'method' => 'HEAD'
00125                 )
00126             );
00127         }
00128 
00129         if ($type == self :: TYPE_POST) {
00130             $postStr= http_build_query($postVars);
00131             $params= array (
00132                 'http' => array (
00133                     'method' => 'POST',
00134                     'content' => $postStr
00135                 )
00136             );
00137             $headers['Content-Type']= 'application/x-www-form-urlencoded';
00138             $headers['Content-Length']= strlen($postStr);
00139         }
00140 
00141         if ($this->rememberCookies && !empty($this->lastCookies)) {
00142             $cookieStr = '';
00143             $idx = 0;
00144             foreach ($this->lastCookies as $n=>$v) {
00145                 if ($idx++>0) { $cookieStr.=' $'; }
00146                 $cookieStr .= $n.'='.$v.';';
00147                 if ($idx+1<count($this->lastCookies)) { $cookieStr.=' '; }
00148             }
00149             $headers['Cookie'] = $cookieStr;
00150         }
00151 
00152         if (is_array($getVars)) {
00153             $url .= '?'.http_build_query($getVars);
00154         }
00155 
00156         $headers['User-Agent']= 'kata httpUtility - http://codeninja.de';
00157 
00158         $headerStr= '';
00159         foreach ($headers as $name => $value) {
00160             $headerStr .= $name.': '.$value."\r\n";
00161         }
00162         $params['http']['header']= $headerStr;
00163         $context= stream_context_create($params);
00164         $stream=  @fopen($url, 'rb', false, $context);
00165 
00166         if (!$stream) {
00167             if (isset($http_response_header)) {
00168                 $http_response_header = array_reverse($http_response_header);
00169                 $headArr = array();
00170                 foreach ($http_response_header as $s) {
00171                     if (substr($s,0,5) == 'HTTP/') {
00172                         break;
00173                     }
00174                     $headArr[] = $s;
00175                 }
00176                 $headArr[] = $this->parseHeaders($headArr);
00177                 return false;
00178             }
00179 
00180             $this->returnHeaders= array (
00181                 'Status' => 0,
00182                 'X-Kata-Error' => 'Stream init failed'
00183             );
00184             return false;
00185         }
00186 
00187         $html= @ stream_get_contents($stream);
00188         $headers= stream_get_meta_data($stream);
00189         if (isset ($headers['wrapper_data'])) {
00190             $this->returnHeaders= $this->parseHeaders($headers['wrapper_data']);
00191         } else {
00192             $this->returnHeaders= $this->parseHeaders($headers);
00193         }
00194         fclose($stream);
00195 
00196         if (false === $html) {
00197             return false;
00198         }
00199 
00200         if ($this->followRedirects) {
00201             $location= isset ($this->returnHeaders['Location']) ? $this->returnHeaders['Location'] : '';
00202             switch ($this->getStatus()) {
00203                 case 301 :
00204                 case 302 :
00205                 case 307 :
00206                     return $this->doRequest($type, $location, $getVars, $postVars, $headers);
00207                     break;
00208                 case 303 : //post->get
00209                     return $this->doRequest($type == self :: TYPE_POST ? self :: TYPE_GET : $type, $location, $getVars, $postVars, $headers);
00210                     break;
00211             }
00212         }
00213 
00214         return $html;
00215     }
00216 
00217     /**
00218      * returns the http-status code of the last request. 0 if we could not figure out status-code
00219      *
00220      * @return int
00221      */
00222     public function getStatus() {
00223         if (isset ($this->returnHeaders['Status'])) {
00224             return $this->returnHeaders['Status'];
00225         }
00226         if (!empty ($this->returnHeaders)) {
00227             $s= $this->returnHeaders[0];
00228             if (substr($s, 0, 4) == 'HTTP') {
00229                 $temp= explode(' ', $s);
00230                 return $temp[1];
00231             }
00232         }
00233         return 0;
00234     }
00235 
00236     /**
00237      * return all webserver-headers from the last request
00238      */
00239     public function getReturnHeaders() {
00240         return is($this->returnHeaders, array ());
00241     }
00242 
00243     protected function parseHeaders($headers) {
00244         $headOut= array ();
00245         foreach ($headers as $h) {
00246             $x= strpos($h, ':');
00247             if ($x === false) {
00248                 $headOut[]= $h;
00249             } else {
00250                 $headOut[substr($h, 0, $x)]= substr($h, $x +2);
00251             }
00252         }
00253         if (isset($headOut['Set-Cookie']) && $this->rememberCookies) {
00254             $this->lastCookies = $this->parseCookies($headOut['Set-Cookie']);
00255         }
00256         return $headOut;
00257     }
00258 
00259     protected function parseCookies($s) {
00260         $cookies = array();
00261         $sArr = explode(';',$s);
00262         foreach ($sArr as $s) {
00263             $s = trim($s);
00264             $name = '';
00265             $x = strpos($s,'=');
00266             if ($x>0) {
00267                 $name = substr($s,0,$x);
00268                 $s = substr($s,$x+1);
00269             }
00270             if (!empty($name)) {
00271                 $cookies[$name] = $s;
00272             }
00273         }
00274         return $cookies;
00275     }
00276 }
